description: This file defines a 'Loader' component using LightningJS framework, which displays animated pulsing dots as a loading indicator.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component that shows animated dots as a loading indicator.

methods.name: _parseColor
methods.description: Parses the loaderColor prop, accepting either a number or a hex string, and returns a color value.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval that toggles the opacity of the dots to create a pulsing animation.
